PLCCommunication

Class UDPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • PLCCommunication.PLCConnection
      • PLCCommunication.UDPConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessage

    public class UDPConnection
extends PLCConnection
implements IMessage
    Connect and communicate with ABB PLC via UDP PLC default address is: 192.168.0.100 og PC PC must have a fixes address at same subnet ex. 192.168.0.100
